inputs.topic_category_motivation: V2G adoption is a macro driver influencing energy transition, grid stability, inflation and monetary policy.
inputs.motivation_for_relevance: No explicit link to a tradable asset or macro handle, no catalyst window, and the article does not discuss V2G adoption; thus it fails the relevance and mapping criteria.
